hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with beef medallions with fresh
horseradish cream that's right this
quick and easy dish is dedicated to that
little mini season between summer and
fall
I call it Falmer used to call it summer
all but that got confusing but anyway
it's a time of year where I crave hearty

start from the bottom with a beautiful
fresh cherry tomato salad so we're gonna
cut up some cherry tomatoes and I'm
calling this a salad it could be a
relish it could be a salsa could be a
couple other things there's got to be a
French term for this but anyway despite
not knowing exactly what to call it I do
know what's in it so we're gonna quarter
some cherry tomatoes generally I would
cut them in half but I do want to get as
much juice as possible for this and once
those are cut we're gonna throw them in
a bowl and to that we're gonna add some
freshly ground black pepper a good
amount of salt and also a pinch of sugar
which is gonna sweeten things up a
little bit but it's also along with the
salt can help draw out those juices and
also put in a little splash of rice wine
vinegar and then all we're gonna do is
mix that up and let that sit at room
temperature for about 15 minutes which
should be approximately how long it
takes you to get the rest of the dish
together all right next up we're gonna
make our fresh horseradish cream which
we'll be featuring this fresh

you just never look for it it's there so

and while I will guess and give you a
measurement
this is totally to taste you're gonna
grade it in taste it and if you want

in so go ahead and grate that in I was

it does kind of get you up in the

that's to taste and yes this is one of

don't know but you can and once that's

the top of our dish is done and now for
the
the middle part so here I have a couple

yon but it doesn't matter what we're

so right there
we're gonna give these a flip and we'll
Brown the other side for 2 minutes at

minutes because we have one more

put a little splash of water into the

we're gonna pour that into our Tomatoes
